text: The flag of Amatitán () It is colored red and white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Red #C90016 White #FFFFFF ==References== Amatitán Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Amatitán
